sentence: Trump's pick against the personally wealthy Meijer, John Gibbs, was also in bad financial shape.
title: Opinion: Republicans who voted to impeach Trump might be in less peril than people think

sentence: We turn next to Michigan's 3rd in the Grand Rapids area, where Trump's forces have consolidated behind conservative commentator John Gibbs' bid to deny renomination to freshman Rep. Peter Meijer in August.
title: House Republicans all lead their challengers in recent fundraising
